title: Calculate a Seller's Net Sheet
description: A seller is considering an offer and wants to know how much money they will walk away with after all costs. The agent needs to prepare a seller's net sheet.

tasks.description: Gather all necessary figures: offer price, outstanding mortgage balance, and estimated closing costs (e.g., commissions, title fees, taxes).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all financial data needed for the calculation.

tasks.description: Use a net sheet calculator to itemize all credits and debits.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed breakdown of all costs and proceeds is generated.

tasks.description: Present the final estimated net proceeds to the seller.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear, easy-to-understand net sheet is generated and shared with the seller client.
